episode_event_newyear_2022/4001_0402_040:
Oh, I know that voice.
[Name:PlayerNickname ], right?
episode_event_newyear_2022/4001_1001_060: Let’s both have a good one.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4001_1001_080:
If you don’t mind, could we take a picture
with you?
episode_event_newyear_2022/4001_1001_100:
I wore this outfit today as a way to start fresh
in the new year.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4001_1001_110:
But as you just saw, people keep approaching me,
one after another.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4001_0401_140: This is a nice outfit, isn’t it.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4001_0402_170:
It’s a little embarrassing when you say it
like that.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4001_1001_180:
I like to spend the start of a new year in peace
and quiet...
episode_event_newyear_2022/4001_1001_190:
Thus, I was hoping to find a quiet spot to calm
my mind.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4001_1001_200:
Aw, MAN! Why are you guys so strong?! You’re
on fire! You totally got us!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4001_1001_230: Whew... Burnt right down to cinders...
episode_event_newyear_2022/4001_1001_240:
That’s the match! The winning sync pair is Volkner
and Electivire!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4001_1001_260:
What a great battle to see at the start of a new
year! I’m thoroughly satisfied!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4001_1001_270:
I’m glad you enjoyed the battle, but don’t get
too comfortable yet!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4001_1001_280: The main event is yet to come!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4001_1001_290:
We’re calling it the New Year’s Battle Tournament,
and I’m pleased to announce that it’s about
to start!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4001_1001_300:
This tournament will consist of
two-on-two battles!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4001_1001_310:
The team that keeps the longest winning streak
going will be declared the winners!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4001_1001_340: I see... So I’ll be partnering with him.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4001_0401_360: I had a premonition. It’s bound to happen.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4001_0402_380:
Yes, exactly. And it will most likely become
our reality.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4001_1001_390:
I also foresaw something else... A premonition that
something dangerous is about to happen.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4001_1001_400:
At this rate, I suppose it’ll be difficult to spend
my time in peace and quiet after all.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4001_1001_410:
But I also sense something about my partnering up
with that man...
episode_event_newyear_2022/4001_1001_420:
Teaming up with him is necessary to stop the
danger that is about to happen.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4001_1001_430:
I can’t tell exactly what that danger will
be, though.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4002_1001_010: Are you ready for some battles?
episode_event_newyear_2022/4002_1001_020:
My partner Pokémon, Electivire, is a force of
nature to be reckoned with.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4002_1001_030:
Actually...don’t get me started. I’ll tell you
another time.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4002_1001_040: So it ended up as I foresaw...
episode_event_newyear_2022/4002_1001_060:
Oh, it’s nothing. Thank you for teaming up
with me.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4002_1001_070:
My partner Pokémon is Chingling. It’s cute but
also very reliable.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4002_1001_080:
Oh, wow! New outfits and partner Pokémon for
the New Year’s Battle Tournament!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4002_1001_100:
If I get some great shots of you in battle, we
could use them to promote Pasio!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4002_1001_110: So go on and show me your best, you two!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4002_1001_120:
Of course. If I’m participating in this tournament,
I intend to win.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4002_1001_130: Yeah, that’s the spirit! Let’s get going, then!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4003_1001_030:
So a Champion is participating in this tournament,
too? I guess it’ll be a challenge, then!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4003_1001_040:
This is going to be our first battle of
the tournament.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4003_1001_050: Let’s sync up and snag ourselves a win!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4003_1001_060:
Yes. I’m sure we’ll get used to battling together,
little by little.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4003_1001_070:
Also...it’d be a shame to lose while wearing such
festive outfits.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4003_1001_080: Are you ready? Here we go!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4003_1001_090:
They sure are tough! Looks like they’ve had a few
battles together to work on their teamwork!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4003_1001_100: How many wins do you have so far?
episode_event_newyear_2022/4003_1001_120: And we plan to add one more with this battle!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4003_1001_130: Yeah! Sorry, but we’re gonna win!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4003_1001_140: Don’t think you’ll take us out that easily!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4003_1001_160:
We were so close! But we let victory slip right
through our fingers...
episode_event_newyear_2022/4003_1001_170: That was an excellent battle. Thank you!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4003_1001_180:
It seems our opponents may have been a bit worn
out from their previous matches.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4003_1001_190:
Yeah. If we’d taken one more hit, we probably
would’ve lost.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4003_1001_200: Your support really helped me out!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4003_1001_210:
It was like you could tell beforehand what I was
going to do. Is that your precognition at work?
episode_event_newyear_2022/4003_1001_230:
You’re usually a quiet person, but when you
start to enjoy yourself in battle, you get
very passionate.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4003_1001_240:
That’s why I tried to make sure I battled in a way
that would help foster that passion.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4003_1001_250:
You sure know your stuff! Let’s keep battling and
start a winning streak, shall we?
episode_event_newyear_2022/4003_1001_260: Sure. Let’s aim for a cleaner win next time.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4003_1101_270:
After that, Volkner and Sabrina battled against
many sync pairs...
episode_event_newyear_2022/4003_1101_280: and steadily increased their winning streak.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4004_1001_010:
We’re doing a great job of keeping our winning
streak going!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4004_1001_020:
I can’t wait to see what other combinations we
can pull off with your precognition!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4004_1001_030: We might just be a good team after all!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4004_1001_070: Yeah! We’ll show you our awesome teamwork!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4004_1001_080: So you joined the tournament, too?
episode_event_newyear_2022/4004_1001_090:
Of course! It’s the perfect opportunity to challenge
you to a rematch!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4004_1001_100: Let us see how hot your spirit burns!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4004_1001_110: Don’t let your guard down, Sabrina.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4004_1001_120: This team is gonna be hard to beat!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4004_1001_130:
I have no intention of letting up. We will put our
all into this battle.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4004_1001_170: Hahaha! Sorry about that, you two!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4004_1001_180:
It’s our win! Looks like we’re starting off this year
on the right foot!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4005_1001_010: So these two are our next opponents.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4005_1001_020:
I feel like I’ve seen that masked Trainer
somewhere before...
episode_event_newyear_2022/4005_1001_030:
Hey hey, what’re you doing, getting pensive when
a battle’s about to start?
episode_event_newyear_2022/4005_1001_040: You can’t beat us if your mind’s on other things!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4005_1001_060:
Now’s not the time to be thinking about anything
other than battling!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4005_1001_100:
I heard your team uses some interesting tactics,
so I’ve been looking forward to this!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4005_1001_110:
Show us the strength you’ve forged by winning
your matches up till now!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4005_1001_130: Look who’s talking! You’re shockingly strong!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4005_1001_140: That said, we’re the ones who’re gonna win here!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4005_1001_160: Extreme conditions really test you and train you!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4005_1001_170: Let’s see who comes out on top!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4005_1001_190: What’s the matter? Things were just getting good.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4005_1001_200:
The system that generates Pasio’s energy just
short-circuited! Certain parts of the island are
experiencing power outages.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4005_1001_210: The generator shorted? That’s not good...
episode_event_newyear_2022/4005_1001_220: You didn’t have a hand in this, did you?
episode_event_newyear_2022/4005_1001_230: C’mon, don’t look at me like that!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4005_1001_240:
I was just battling, so there’s no way I could’ve
done anything.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4005_1001_250:
I suppose you’re right. But if it wasn’t you, why
did this happen?
episode_event_newyear_2022/4005_1001_260: Could that be the source of our problem?
episode_event_newyear_2022/4005_1001_270: Why don’t we postpone this battle for now?
episode_event_newyear_2022/4005_1001_280:
We should probably resolve any issues with that
generator first, if it’s broken.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4005_1001_300:
Yeah, I got you. I’ll go check if there have been
any accidents because of the power outages!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4005_1001_310:
I’m planning on checking out the area where we
saw that bright flash of light just now. Want to
come with?
episode_event_newyear_2022/4005_1001_320: Of course. We are a team, after all.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4006_1001_020:
I see. Their electrical discharge must be why the
power generator shorted!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4006_1001_040:
Let’s work together and try to calm those
Pokémon down.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4006_1001_050:
Raichu are usually gentle, but they turn aggressive
if they have too much electricity in their bodies.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4006_1001_060:
I’m sure those Magnemite are also being affected
by Raichu, too.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4006_1001_070:
We can have a Pokémon battle to make them
discharge all that electricity!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4006_1001_080:
That makes sense. I suppose you’d know best,
being an Electric-type Gym Leader.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4006_1001_090:
Let’s show them our teamwork that we built up
during the New Year’s Battle Tournament!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4007_1001_020:
We got them to discharge a lot of energy by
battling them...
episode_event_newyear_2022/4007_1001_030:
But it looks like they’re still a bit on edge. Maybe
it’s because we cornered them.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4007_1001_060: Watch out! It’s dangerous to get too close!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4007_1001_070: It’s OK. There’s nothing to be afraid of.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4007_1001_090:
If we’ve gotten them to discharge most of their
energy, all we have to do is calm them down.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4007_1001_100:
Whenever I hear Chingling’s bell, it soothes my
soul... So I figured it would work here, too.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4007_1001_110:
Oh, that makes sense. You had me worried for
a second!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4007_1001_120:
Now all that’s left is to return these Pokémon
to their Trainers.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4007_1001_130: Thank you, Chingling. You did well.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4007_1001_140:
I think this was the dangerous event I foresaw.
I’m glad we were able to put an end to that.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4007_1001_150: I see you’ve taken care of things here!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4007_1001_170:
My buddy, the Masked Royal, told me everything,
so I came here as fast as I could!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4007_1001_180: The Trainers of those Pokémon will be here soon.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4007_1001_190:
Hmm... The Pokémon seem to have calmed
down. Looks like their heart rates are back to
normal, too.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4007_1001_200:
I imagine the lightning that struck last night was
the reason they were so worked up.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4007_1001_210:
The air around them was charged with electricity,
and they probably took in too much of it.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4007_1001_220:
My guess is when they tried to discharge it,
it caused the power generator to short-circuit.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4007_1001_240:
That Electivire of yours might have played a part
in all this, too.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4007_1001_260:
It seems some lightning clouds formed in the sky
right where you two were training.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4007_1001_270:
Electivire’s electrical energy output is one of the
best of all Electric-type Pokémon. Wild as it may
sound, he may have changed the weather.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4007_1001_280:
Well, that’s Electivire for you! I guess that
happens sometimes!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4007_1001_290: So you were the cause of this after all!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4007_1001_300:
Whatever! You already solved the problem.
Now, we just have to repair the power-
generating system!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4007_1001_310: It’ll probably take some time to repair that, right?
episode_event_newyear_2022/4007_1001_320: Yes, and it’s bound to be troublesome.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4007_1001_330:
Since we may have played a part in causing all
of this, how about we help you fix it?
episode_event_newyear_2022/4007_1001_340:
You just want to tinker with the machines,
don’t you!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4007_1001_350: Haha! You saw right through me!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4007_1001_360:
I’ve been curious about how Pasio’s power
system was set up!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4008_1001_010: I know we’ve solved the first problem...
episode_event_newyear_2022/4008_1001_020:
But I really am still concerned about that
power generator...
episode_event_newyear_2022/4008_1001_030: You’re still going on about that?
episode_event_newyear_2022/4008_1001_040:
OK, already! If you’re that intent on working on it,
I’ll think about it!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4008_1001_070: Volkner! Sabrina! Is everything all right?
episode_event_newyear_2022/4008_1001_080: I heard you fought a massive bolt of lightning!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4008_1001_090: Oh, that’s just an exaggeration. Who told you that?
episode_event_newyear_2022/4008_1001_110:
The cause of the commotion was just a Raichu
and some Magnemite.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4008_1001_120:
But these two sync pairs solved the problem,
no sweat!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4008_1001_150:
I can’t say I’m proud that we caused problems for
everyone, but...
episode_event_newyear_2022/4008_1001_160: We did make a pretty good team, didn’t we?
episode_event_newyear_2022/4008_1001_170: Yes, it wasn’t bad at all.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4008_1001_180:
I’m actually not a huge fan of battling...but I had
a lot of fun today.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4008_1001_190:
I think you two might even be the winning team
for the New Year’s Battle Tournament!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4008_1001_200: Didn’t you have a pretty big winning streak?
episode_event_newyear_2022/4008_1001_210:
Well? Do you remember how many battles
you won?
episode_event_newyear_2022/4008_1001_220: Uh... I stopped counting partway through.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4008_1001_230:
And with all that commotion about the power
going out, I completely forgot about it!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4008_1001_240:
I don’t remember the details, but I think it’s fine as
long as we all had fun!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4008_1001_260: Oh well. It’s still fantastic! Just fantastic!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4008_1001_280:
Well... As long as everyone had fun, this
tournament has been a huge success!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4008_1001_290:
I suppose it’ll be difficult to have a quiet start to
the new year.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4008_1001_300:
But somehow, all of this clamor is surprisingly
calming my spirit.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4008_1001_310: I think we’ll all have a great year.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4008_1001_330: I hope we all have a wonderful new year.
episode_event_newyear_2022/4008_1001_350:
There are a lot of sync pairs here that remind me
how fun it is to battle!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4008_1001_360:
As long as we’re here on Pasio, it’s bound to be
an exciting year!
episode_event_newyear_2022/4008_1001_370:
Yes. Even without seeing into the future, I know
that’s true.
